description: This file contains test cases for the 'Agent' class and its interactions with various tools and models, specifically testing tool invocation, streaming responses, async behavior, and tool call limits within the context of the 'anthropic' model 'Claude'.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content for the agent using the Claude model with YFinanceTools.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool call events during the stream.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool call events.

methods.name: test_tool_use_tool_call_limit
methods.description: Tests that the agent respects the tool call limit and only invokes the first tool.

methods.name: test_tool_use_with_content
methods.description: Verifies tool invocation and content when multiple questions are asked.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Checks that multiple tool calls are made in parallel for a compound query.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Verifies multiple different tools are called for a complex query.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that processes a list of URLs and verifies the correct functions are called.
